participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and supportive, values friendships and family.
participant_1.background: I take time to enjoy nature and spend time with my mother. I'd brag about my loyal friends who have stuck with me through thick and thin. I love to show my friends the sunflowers I grow. I'm doing my best to be a good role model for my daughter, and I hope she's learning a lot at school. I would travel the world if I could.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and optimistic, loves sharing joy with others.
participant_2.background: I enjoy sharing my love of music and unicorns with others. I've been with my current partner for three years, and we're going strong. I played football in college. Yes, I have four dogs. I like to visit websites that have information about my allergies and trophies.

content.text: Hi! I'd brag about my loyal friends who have stuck with me through thick and thin.
That's really great! I also have some great friends who are always there for me.
I'm doing my best to be a good role model for my daughter, and I hope she's learning a lot at school.
That's so sweet! My partner and I are expecting our first child in April, so I'm excited to be a mom soon.
Congratulations! That's such exciting news! I'm sure you'll be a great mom.
Thanks! I'm trying to prepare as much as I can.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a natural.
What are you most looking forward to about being a mom?
There are so many things! I'm excited to watch them grow and learn, and to be a part of their lives.
That's going to be so much fun!
Well, congratulations again! I'm sure you're going to be a great mom.
